title: Somerville - Union Sq 1 bed Luxury condo
posting_body: A fantastic, almost new luxury 1 Br located between Union and Inman Squares in Somerville.
Easy access to all areas of Somerville, Cambridge, and Boston!
Direct easy access to the new Union square green line T station (1 minute walk).
Some of the best food, restaurants and culture within walking distance (walk score of 94!), and multiple buses pick up within 2 blocks.

A/C, 10 ft ceilings, gourmet kitchen, large walk in closet, fantastic storage, free laundry, heat and hot water/incl, parking (1 garage spot incl, additional spot available), shared roof deck (views of Boston and Cambridge), shared patio space, hardwood floors, floor to ceiling windows, bike storage (in locked bike room), storage unit in basement.

Bow Market, Back Bar, Highland Kitchen, Juilet, Field and Vine, Celeste, Ebi Sushi, Nibble, Puritan and Co, Bronwyn, Casa B, The Independent, Union Sq Donuts, Christina's Ice Cream, All Star Sandwich Bar, Clover, New Deal Seafood, Lone Star Taco Bar, Bloc 11, and many more!
